official_title: Expanding Clinical Trial Awareness Among Black Communities Through Digital Engagement
inclusion_criteria:
* Are 18 years of age or older
* Identify as Black/African- American
* Have Current or previous diagnosis of cancer
* Speak and understand English
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Are younger than 18 years of age
* Do not identify as Black/African- American
* Do not have a current or previous diagnosis of cancer
* Are non - English-speaking
